recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Preheat oven

recipes.name: Baked Hawaiian Sandwiches
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 400° and place a rack on the lower half of the oven. Place a half slice of ham, cheeses, and turkey on the bottom of each roll. Stir together butter, sugar, onion flakes, poppy seeds, and honey mustard. Brush over the top of each sandwich. Bake for 15 min. or until tops are golden brown and fillings are hot. Personal Note: Use parchment paper. Don’t need onion flakes and poppy seeds.

recipes.name: Bean Dip
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Layer in this order.

recipes.name: Brown Sugar Smokies
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350° Cut bacon into thirds. Cover (dip) bacon into brown sugar. Roll one sausage in each piece of bacon. Arrange on foil lined baking pan. Sprinkle a lot of brown sugar over top. Bake for 20 min. Pit on chafing dish or slow cooker to keep warm.

recipes.name: Cherry Punch
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 6 oz. can Frozen Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
6 oz. can Frozen Limeade Concentrate, thawed
recipes.directions: In a blender, combine concentrates and pineapple; cover and blend until smooth. Pour into a gallon- size container; stir in water. Store in the refrigerator. To serve, pour the mixture into a punch bowl; add cherry soda and ginger ale. Garnish with lemon and lime slices if desired. Yield: about 6 quarts

recipes.name: Sweet Sausage Rolls
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 400°  Unroll crescent dough and separate into triangles.  Cut each length wise into 3 triangles.  Roll a sausage in each and set aside.  Combine remaining ingredients in 11 by 7 inch pan.  Arrange sausage rolls, seam side down, in butter mixture.  Bake uncovered for 15-20 min.

recipes.name: Meatloaf
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 1 cup Dried Bread or Cracker Crumbs
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350° In a large bowl, combine the beef, egg, onion, milk, and bread crumbs or cracker crumbs.  Season with salt and pepper to taste and place in a lightly greased 5 by 9 inch loaf pan, or form into a loaf and place in a lightly greased 9 by 13 inch baking dish.  In a separate small bowl, combine the brown sugar, mustard, and ketchup.  Mix well and pour over the meatloaf.  Bake for 1 hour. Editor’s Note: Double the ketchup mixture.  Sauté onions in butter before adding to meat.

recipes.name: Sloppy Joes
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: ¼ cup Green Bell Pepper, chopped
recipes.directions: In a medium skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef, onion, and green pepper; drain off liquids.  Stir in the garlic powder, mustard, ketchup, and brown sugar; mix thoroughly.  Reduce heat, and simmer for 30 minutes.  Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Indian Casserole
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350ºF. Lightly spray a 9x13x2-inch pan with cooking spray. Melt 2 Tbsp of butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add zucchini, squash and onion. Sauté for 10 minutes, or until tender. Add garlic and cook and additional 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir together cooked zucchini, squash, onion, corn, white cheddar cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, eggs, salt and pepper. Stir in ½ cup of breadcrumbs and ½ cup of parmesan cheese. Spread mixture into prepared pan. Melt remaining 2 Tbsp butter. Combine melted butter, remaining breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake uncovered for 45 to 50 minutes.

recipes.name: Green Beans
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flake, or to taste
recipes.directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add red pepper flake and stir to coat the pepper in the oil. Add green beans and cook, stirring often until the beans are blistering and browning in areas, 5 to 7 minutes. Add garlic and salt and cook, stirring constantly until the garlic is fragrant and browning, about 30 seconds. Add water and immediately cover with a well-fitting lid or sheet of aluminum foil. Steam the green beans, covered, until they are bright green and crisp tender, 1 to 2 minutes. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Mini Chicken Pot Pies
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 375. Thaw frozen veggies. Combine cream of chicken soup, sour cream, poulty seasoning, salt, and pepper. Add in chicken and veggies, and sprinkle in some cheese. Spray muffin pan or ramekins. Line with crescent rolls (you can pinch rolls together and cut the size crescent square you want. Use a cookie scoop to fill evenly. Cook for about 18 minutes.

recipes.name: Stuffing
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Night before:  Tear up bread and put it in a bowl on the counter. Mix it up a few times throughout so the bread becomes hard.  On Thanksgiving: Dice about 1/4 cup onion and 1/4 cup celery.  Saute with 1 tbsp of butter until soft. Add to bread crumbs. Sprinkle sage over bread crumbs.  Put enough on so it looks seasoned but not completely green!  Salt and pepper too! Add one beaten egg. Add some chicken broth. Just add a little at a time.Mix with your hands. You want it to be moist enough but not soaking. Stuff turkey - both sides. Put extra in foil or casserole dish.

recipes.name: Swenson Burger Sauces
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar (omit if using Miracle Whip)
recipes.directions: Combine all ingredients. Give at 1-2 hours to sit before eating.

recipes.name: Honey Soy Chicken Marinade
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 1/4 cup Chinese cooking wine or dry sherry (sub chicken broth)
recipes.directions: For the marinade, combine all ingredients. You may garnish chicken with green onions. For the serving sauce, place reserved sauce in a small saucepan. Mix cornflour and water, then add into saucepan. Simmer over medium for 5 minutes, stirring regularly, until it thickens to a syrupy consistency.

recipes.name: BLT Sandwich Sauce
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Combine all ingredients.

recipes.name: Panera Kitchen Sink Cookies
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 1 tsp baking soda dissolved in 1 tbsp water
8 ounces semi-sweet or milk chocolate, chopped
5 ounces (2 bags) Werther's soft caramels, each cut in half
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350ºF. In a large mixing bowl, melt the butter and coconut oil with the brown sugar in the microwave. Stir and let mixture sit for 5 minutes. Whisk in the egg, the egg yolk, and the vanilla. Add the flour, baking soda water, and salt. Mix just until dough forms. Fold in the chocolate and pretzel crumbs. Toss the caramel pieces in a little bit of flour to prevent clumping, and mix them into the dough as well. Scoop ¼ cup of dough and roll it into a ball. Try to tuck the caramel pieces inside the dough or keep them on top. Place 6 balls of dough on each baking pan, leaving plenty of room for spreading. Sprinkle generously with flaked sea salt. Bake for 9 minutes, and then let cool completely on the baking pan.

recipes.name: Broccoli Casserole
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 1 Large Bunch Broccoli, 10 minutes cooked and drained
2 10 ounce cans Cream of Mushroom Soup
3 ounces Ritz Crackers, about 32 crackers, crushed
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350º.  Mix and put all non-topping ingredients into greased 13 by 9 inch pan.  Combine the crackers and butter.  Pour on top of mixture.  Bake for 35-45 minutes.

recipes.name: Amish Macaroni Salad
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 1 ½ Small Red Bell Peppers, seeded and chopped
¼ cup and 1 tsp. Prepared Yellow Mustard
1 tbsp. and ½ tsp. White Vinegar
recipes.directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add macaroni, and cook for 8-10 minutes, until tender.  Drain, and set aside to cool.  In a large bowl, stir together the eggs, onion, celery, red pepper, and relish.  In a small bowl, stir together the mayo, miracle whip, mustard, sugar, vinegar, salt, and celery seed.  Pour over the vegetables, and stir in macaroni until well blended.  Cover and chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

recipes.name: Green Bean Casserole
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 2 cans Green Beans, thawed and drained
1 ½ cups French Fried Onions, divided
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350°  Mix all ingredients except for ½ cup french fried onions, in 1 ½ quart casserole dish.  Bake for 30 minutes.  Top with remaining onions.  Bake 5 minutes more or until onions are golden.

recipes.name: Ham & Hash Brown Casserole
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 2 cans Condensed Cram of Potato Soup
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 375°  Lightly grease a 9 by 13 inch baking dish.  In a large bowl, mix hash browns, ham, cream of potato soup, sour cream, and cheddar cheese.  Spread evenly into prepared dish.  Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.  Bake 1 hour or until bubbly and lightly brown.  Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Sticky Rice Noodles
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Soak rice noodles in almost boiling water for 4 minutes, until al dente. Drain, then rinse with cold water. Meanwhile, melt butter in a large skilled, add green onions and garlic. Saute for 1-2 minutes. Add sugar and mix unitl incorporated. Add soy sauce and let simmer for 1 minute. Add noodles and continue to cook for 5-7 mintues until noodles have freid and absorbed the sauce. Garnish with additional green onion.

recipes.name: Mongolian Beef
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Slice the steak in ¼-inch slices. Lay the slices flat, and use a meat pounder to flatten the meat. Put the meat in a ziploc bag and coat in the cornstarch. Pour the canola oil into a large frying pan, and heat on medium high heat. Add the steak to the pan in a single layer and cook for 30 seconds per side. Set steak aside, then sprinkle with salt. Next, add the ginger, garlic, and red pepper flakes (if desired for more spice) to the pan and sauté for 10-15 seconds. Stir in soy sauce, water, and brown sugar and bring the mixture to a boil. Fold the steak back in and let the sauce thicken for 20-30 seconds. (The cornstarch used on the steak should thicken the sauce.) Turn off the heat, add the green onions, and stir to combine. Serve over white rice, rice noodles or in lettuce wraps.

recipes.name: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Place chicken in single layer in air fryer. Bake at 380 for 15 minutes, turning halfway

recipes.name: Crock Pot Mexican Chicken
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 4 oz. can mild diced green chilies
recipes.directions: Rub chicken breasts with oil and place in the bottom of your slow cooker. Add all of the remaining ingredients. Cook on high for 2-4 hours or on low for 6-7 hours or until chicken is tender enough to shred. Shred the chicken and let it cook on low for an additional 20 minutes to absorb some of the liquid/juices. Drain all excess liquid. Taste and add hot sauce to taste if desired. If serving over rice, try stirring in some enchilada sauce after you drain your chicken for some saucy Enchilada Mexican Chicken.

recipes.name: Baked Chicken Burritos
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions:
Prepare Mexican Chicken according to recipe directions. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with foil and add a baking rack on top. Prepare burritos by adding a heaping ½ cup filling to each tortilla, top with desired amount of cheese and roll up burrito style. Place burritos on the baking rack and brush both sides lightly with olive oil or spray with nonstick cooking spray. Cook for 18-20 minutes or until golden. Broil to desired crispiness, flip over and broil the other side until golden. 
 Meanwhile, prepare sauce by melting butter in olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook, stirring constantly for 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low then gradually whisk in chicken broth. Add spices and bring to a simmer while stirring until thickened, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in green chilies, cheese until melted, then sour cream. Add hot sauce to taste (optional). To serve, top burritos Cheesy Green Chili Sour Cream Sauce and desired toppings.

recipes.name: Southwest Chicken Wrap
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: .75 lb chicken breasts, boneless and skinless
¼ cup lime juice , about one lime
1 tsp olive oil , to sauté the veggies
¾ cup thawed or fresh corn kernels
1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed
¼ cup cotija cheese or cheddar cheese
½-1 Tbsp chipotle peppers in adobo
1-2 Tbsp water, *to thin the crema a bit
recipes.directions: Cut chicken into small bite-sized pieces. Marinate with chicken ingredients for 15min - 24 hrs. Combine all crema ingredients. You can use a blender to combine if you like. Saute the chicken and set aside. Saute the pepper and onion. Add in garlic. Add the chicken back in to bring it back to temperature. Make and wrap burritos. In a skillet, heat butter and brown burritos on both sides.

recipes.name: Kielbasa & Veggie Sheet Pan
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 400 and cover roasting pan with parchment paper. Cut all ingredients and spead out on pan. Drizzle with olive oil and toss with spices. Bake for 30-45 minutes. Add cheese for garnish.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 8-16 ounces sliced white mushrooms or baby bella mushrooms
recipes.directions: Warm 2 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in mushrooms and cook until soft, approximately 3 minutes. Remove mushrooms and their liquid, and set aside. Pour stock into saucepan and bring to boil, then reduce to low simmer. In another saucepan, melt 4 tablespoons butter until foaming. Add onions and garlic. Cook only until onions are softened, not browned. Add white wine if using and give time for alcohol to cook off. Add rice. Stir until a few grains start to pop. Add broth, a few ladles of stock, salt, and pepper. Stir over low heat until liquid has been absorbed. Continue adding stock a few ladles at a time, letting the rice absorb the liquid before adding more. Stir constantly. After approximately 20 to 25 minutes, rice should be just tender and risotto thick and creamy. Remove saucepan from heat. Add parmesan cheese and remaining 1 tablespoon butter. Mix until butter has melted. Stir in mushrooms. Season with more salt, if necessary.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmigiana
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: ½ cup Italian Dry Bread Crumbs
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 350°  For the sauce: In oil in large skillet, sauté onion and garlic. Add tomatoes, paste, oregano,basil, salt, pepper, and sugar. Bring to a boil and simmer for 45 minutes, covered. Breading Eggplant: Remove skin! Lay eggplant on paper towels to absorb excess liquid. In pie plate, combine eggs and 1 tbsp. of water. Mix well with fork. Combine bread crumbs and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese. Dip eggplant into egg mixture in crumb mixture. In oil in skillet sauté eggplant until golden brown and crisp on both sides. Add oil as needed. In 13 by 9 inch greased pan,arrange half of the eggplant on the bottom. Sprinkle parmesan and top with mozzarella cheese. Cover with half of tomato sauce. Arrange remaining eggplant over sauce. Top with remaining sauce and cheese. Sprinkle withParmesan. Bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes. To serve frozen: Bake frozen ate 350 covered for 45 minutes. Then bake uncovered for 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Creamy Chicken and Pasta
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 1/2 cup White Wine or Chicken Broth
recipes.directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute mushrooms and onions in butter for 4-5 minutes. Add wine or broth and garlic. Bring to boil; cook until liquid is reduced by half, about 5 minutes. Combine flour and water until smooth; gradually add to mushrom mixture. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in cream. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 4-5 minutes. Drain pasta. Add pasta, chicken, salt, and pepper to cream sauce. Cook 3-4 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parmesan.

recipes.name: Salmon
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Heat the olive oil in a non-stick pan. Season the salmon generously with salt. Cook the salmon for 3 minutes then turn and cook for a further 3 minutes.

recipes.name: Snickerdoodles
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Beat butter until smooth. Add in white sugar packed brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. In another bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, kosher salt, and cream of tartar. Gently beat the flour mixture into the butter mixture. Don't overdo it. Make cinnamon & sugar mix. Roll dough balls in cinnamon & sugar. Bake 9-11 minutes, until the edges are barely set. Let the cookies set up on the pan for at least 3-5 minutes. Remove the cookies to a wire cooling rack and let cool for a few minutes. While the cookies are still warm, but cool enough to handle (and not falling apart), place each cookie back into the bowl of cinnamon sugar.

recipes.name: Sugar Cookies
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 4 1/2 cups all purpose flour, spooned and leveled
1/4 cup granulated sugar, for smashing cookies
recipes.directions: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, beat butter for about 2 minutes. Make sure it is nice and smooth, light and fluffy. Add granulated sugar, powdered sugar, and vegetable oil. Beat until well combined. Add vanilla and eggs. Beat well until smooth. Add flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and kosher salt. Beat the dry ingredients into the dough until just barely combined; don’t over mix.     Roll into 1 inch balls. The dough is pretty soft because of the oil, but fear not, they bake up just fine. Add 1/4 cup of granulated sugar to a plate. Lightly wet the bottom of a drinking glass that has a flat bottom. Dip the glass in the sugar and use it to smash one cookie dough ball. Dip in sugar again and repeat with the remaining dough. You want to smash the cookies so they are about 1/4 inch thick. Bake about 10-12 minutes. You want the edges of the cookie to be light brown, and there should be no shine in the center of the cookie. Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes on the pan, then remove to a cooling rack to cool completely. Use Royal Icing recipe.

recipes.name: Royal Icing
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 2/3 cup water plus more for flood icing
recipes.directions: Combine ingredients in the bowl of a stand mixer. Mix on low speed with a whisk attachment until ingredients are combined. Turn up the speed to med/high and mix for 5 min or until very thick, shiny, stiff and white. You want the peaks of the icing to stand straight up without flopping over at all. If you want to make several different colors, divide the icing into several different bowls and beat in the food coloring by hand with a rubber spatula. For flood icing, add a bit more water at a time until you get the consistency you want- You want to be able to pull up a spoonful of icing and have it drip back down into the bowl and combine with the rest of the icing within just a few seconds.

recipes.name: Brownie Trifle
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 1 package Brownie Mix with Chocolate Chips
Chocolate Candy Bar, to shave and put on top
recipes.directions: Make brownies according to package directions.  Cool completely and cut into 1 inch squares.  Whip heavy cream with sugar and vanilla until stiff peaks form.  In a large bowl, combine pudding mix, water, and sweetened condensed milk.  Fold in half of the whipped cream.  In a trifle bowl, make a layer of brownies.  Spread 1/3 of the chocolate mixture on top of the brownies, and then 1/3 of the whipped cream on top of that.  Repeat the layers until you fill the bowl.  Top with the shaved chocolate.  Chill overnight.

recipes.name: Cannoli Dip
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
recipes.directions: Beat together ricotta, cream cheese, and powdered sugar. Add in vanilla. Add more powdered sugar if needed, up to 1/2 cup. Mix in chocolate chips.

recipes.name: Pie Dough
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: For one single pie crust or 4-6 tart shells:
For one 8, 9, or 10 inch double crust or lattice-top pie two 8, 9, or 10 inch single crust pies or 6-8 tale tart shells:
recipes.directions: Sift flour and salt together; cut in shortening with pastry blender until pieces are the size of small peas. Add water, 1 tbsp. at a time.

recipes.name: Apple Pie Filling
recipes.author: Niki Marotta
ingredients: 6-8 Tart Apples, pared, cored, and thinly sliced
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 400°  Combine sugar, flour, spices, and salt.  Mix with apples.  Line 9 inch pie plate with pastry.  Fill with mixture and dot with butter.  Cut slices only on top pie crust.  Bake for 50 minutes.

recipes.name: Cinnamon & Sugar Nutella Pastry Tree
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 1 tablespoon sugar mixed with 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
recipes.directions: Preheat oven to 400° and thaw pastry sheets. Cut pastry sheets into the shape of a tree. Spread nutella on one pastry sheet. Lay the second pasty sheet on top. Don't forget the stump and star! Cut 1 inch thick strips down the tree and twist. Brush with egg yolk. Bake 25 minutes. Brush with butter and sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.

recipes.name: Perfectly Chocolate Chocolate Cake
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
recipes.directions:
Preheat oven to 350° Grease and flour two 9 in. round baking pans.
Combine dry ingredients in large bowl. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla; beat on medium speed for 2 min. Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin) Pour into pans. Bake 30-35 min. Cool for 10 min.
Frost with Perfectly Chocolate Chocolate Frosting
Yield: 10-12 servings
Only bake for 20-25 min. for cupcakes.

recipes.name: Chicken Gnocchi Soup
recipes.author: Cassie Abood
ingredients: 3-4 boneless skinless chicken breasts - cooked and diced
recipes.directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add celery, onions, garlic, and carrots and saute for 2-3 minutes until onions are translucent. Add chicken, chicken broth, salt, pepper, and thyme, bring to a boil, then gently stir in gnocchi. Boil for 3-4 minutes longer before reducing heat to a simmer and cooking for 10 minutes. Stir in half and half, heavy whipping cream, and spinach and cook another 1-2 minutes until spinach is tender. Taste, add salt and pepper if needed, and serve.
